description: User is escalating an issue to leadership.

tones.professional:
INTENT: Escalation.

Remove preamble ('em không muốn làm lớn chuyện'). Structure: problem → impact → what you've tried → ask. No hedging.

TONE: Professional. Clear, factual, action-oriented.

STRUCTURE: Problem. Impact (timeline/customer/team). What you need (decision, resource). Maximum 5 sentences.
tones.direct: INTENT: Escalation. Problem, impact, ask. No preamble. Maximum 4 sentences.
tones.warm: INTENT: Escalation. Same structure, slightly softer tone. Maximum 5 sentences.
tones.formal: INTENT: Escalation. Formal escalation. Dates, impact, requested action. Maximum 5 sentences.
